Reaction Mechanism
First Order Reactions
Second Order Reactions
how different conditions affect the speed of a reaction.
Factors Affecting Reaction Rates
Order of Reactions
Reaction order defines how the rate is affected by the concentration of each reactant. It can be zero,
Determining Reaction Order
Reaction order is determined experimentally using methods such as the method of initial rates.
This equation shows the dependence of the rate constant on temperature and activation energy.
Catalysts increase the rate of a reaction by lowering the activation energy without being consumed
in the reaction.
A mechanism is a detailed step-by-step description of how a reaction occurs at the molecular level.
Elementary Reactions
These laws allow us to calculate concentrations of reactants at any time during the reaction process

Writing Job Descriptions and Person Specifications
Securing the right person with the right skills for the right role is vital for any organisation. When there is a good
fit between a person and their role, that person is likely to learn quickly and be more engaged and productive.
detrimental impact on colleagues and customers as well as the new recruit. Taking the time to develop a good
job description and person specification can make all the difference in terms of finding the right or wrong person
JOB DESCRIPTION AND PERSON SPECIFICATION:
ASAP and depending upon notice period
This is a fabulous role providing the full range of administrative and personal support to our
Key Responsibilities:
Manage the coordination and logistics of both internal and external meetings.
Arrange detailed domestic and international travel plans, including but not limited to
booking travel, accommodations, car services, developing itineraries and agendas, and
preparing documentation for travel-related meetings.
Draft correspondence, reports and other communications on behalf of the CEO.
Maintain an effective and efficient electronic and hard copy filing system.
Edit and manage spreadsheets, produce presentations, reports and other documents.
Screen incoming calls and determine the level of priority, while using caution in dispensing
information.
Lead and coordinate on ad hoc projects as requested.
management and onboarding.
Report any errors, problems or mistakes which may give cause for concern or complaint

An annual salary of c.£35,000 (full time (37.5 hours) and permanent role).
Following a successful probationary period, our discretionary benefits include access
employee assistance programme, interest-free season ticket loan, discretionary bonus
scheme, annual eye test, along with additional paid annual leave including ½ day
birthday leave, 2 days religious holidays, 2 days annual slow travel leave and 1 ‘
Chambers offers a group pension scheme paying 6% of salary into an individual’s
pension scheme where the employee contributes at least 3% of their salary. This is
available after successful completion of a probationary period.
A modern and spacious office space with showers, bike storage and games room.
Lincoln’s Inn Fields (the largest public square in London).
Our London office is open Monday to Friday from 8:00am to 6:30pm.  Although most of our
team work a mix of in-office and home working, we are predominantly office based.  We aim
to be as flexible as we can, taking into account the role and the needs of the business.
